title: Private Gated Dominican Republic Celebrity Escape with Seven Restaurants, Three Beaches & Golf Courses
description:
There are some experiences in life that should not be missed and a stay at the private gated, celebrity-revered and ultra-luxurious Casa de Campo Resort & Villas is one of them. Facing the glistening azure Caribbean Sea, stretching over 7,000 acres, this five-star hotel, resort and residential community in La Romana is a tropical playground for the likes of Kim Kardashian, Jay-Z, Beyonc√© and more.

Ranked within the top 1% of the world on Tripadvisor, awarded Dominican Republic's Leading Resort 2021 and World's Leading Luxury Sports & Villa Resort six years running by The World Travel Awards, Casa de Campo Resort & Villas is a self-contained, seaside paradise overflowing with world-class amenities. Soak up the sun from the resort's private Minitas Beach and Beach Club with chaise loungers, wine and dine across seven restaurants, enjoy a treatment in the wickedly lavish spa and practice your swing across three Pete Dye-designed championship golf courses, 13 tennis courts or three polo playing fields. If that wasn't enough, this exquisite resort boasts a movie theatre, a full-service marina, shooting range and a custom-built full-size artist's village focusing on native history and culture
offer_address: Carretera La Romana - Higuey Hwy, La Romana 22000, Dominican Republic
